title: Bloom - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Wealthy Characters
author: Big Grey Wolf With Wings   长着翅膀的大灰狼
description:
A bunch of conceited and unruly gangsters

Wandering in between black and white (right and wrong)

Only living according to their code

To release or to obtain

Certainly, you are a woman I cannot obtain, how can I willingly let go?

A girl who follow her heart’s desire

No dreams, no goals

However in the abyss of one’s heart is one’s love-hate

Young lover, cold and detached family, carrying a human life, tangled in love-hate relationship

She is on the road of trails and hardships, walking and loving>
